lines.text: Richard, I want that goddamn film.

[re evidence of a nuclear power plant accident]
I may be wrong, but I'd say you're lucky to be alive. For that matter, I think we might say the same for the rest of Southern California.
I know the vibration was not normal.
What makes you think they're looking for a scapegoat?
Scram the son of a bitch.

[defending her cameraman]
He's good, I think he's good. He's won a lot of awards.
I'm sure. Hothead award, Foulmouth award, Can-of-worms award...
He was not a loony. He was the sanest man I ever knew in my life.
...and let this lunatic wipe out a billion dollar investment? At least this buys time; it will take the press an hour to get here.
I'm counting on you to take care of the God damn press. Now you do your Job, and let me do mine.
Mr. Mc Cormack I can't take responsibility for this.
What's your alternative? Let this maniac wash out a billion dollar investment? At least this buys time, it will take the press an hour to get here.
I'm counting on you to take care of the goddamn press. Now you do your job and I'll do mine.
